Tell us about your EV

```{r}
years <- rev(seq(2010, 2025, 1))
names(years) <- years

sd_question(
  type   = "select",
  id     = "year",
  label  = "Model year:",
  option = years
)

sd_output('make', type = 'question')

sd_output('model', type = 'question')
```
